name: Wilderness Rod
desc: A rather pedestrian-looking wooden fishing rod. Apart from being quite sturdy, even to point where you could use it for self-defense, it lacks any sort of special features. But the old adage holds true â€” "the novice's rod shall be the tent-pole of their veterancy." Even the greatest of anglers must surely have started with this simple implement.

customize.name: Nantuck
customize.desc: A senior fisherman in the Mondstadt Fishing Association and a soon-to-be famous sea-life author. He guarantees that his story about a heroic fisherman pursuing a giant black whale will be a literary success once published.

customize.text: at Cider Lake in the <color=#37ffff>World Quest - Exploding Population</color> to obtain the Fishing Rod.

value.text: A basic fishing rod that has no special effect.
